page.title: 02PIREHILL FIRST SCHOOL
page.content: Address: Tilling Drive, Walton, Stone. Age of pupils: 5 to 9 years. There are over 200 children in our school and 38 children in Class 6. 15 of the older ones will be leaving in July and going on to Walton Priory Middle School in September. The others will go into Class 7 at our school. This is what we think of our school: The uniform at our school is very smart It is blue and grey. If a school doesn't have a uniform it doesn't seem like a proper school to me. Each class is different. Each class is interesting At our Summer Fete there were stalls and sideshows, a gymnastic display and a fancy dress competition. We are work- ing for a water safety award from the Royal Life Saving Society. This is very important because we are near a very fast flowing river.
